subject: Testing a private method having arguments of type arrays
msgSnippet: hi everybody, i got stuck with a problem of testing a private function. iam using the previligedAccessor class given in he JUNIT FAQS for this. my method to
messageBody:
hi everybody,

i got stuck with a problem of testing a private function.
iam using the previligedAccessor class given in he JUNIT FAQS for this.
my method to test takes three arguments,one string and two string
arrays.I got the problem in initialising the args argument ( 3rd
argument ) of invokeMethod() of previligedAccesor class.This argument
should be of an array of java.lang.Object type.

plz guide me regarding this ...


Thanks and Regards
Vara Prasad
